entry.data:
SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS AROUND 70

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
